Pages.Title: Home Page
Pages.Description: Website home page for this layout.

Pages.Title: About Us Page
Pages.Description: This about us page is designed to describe a business and it's staff.

Pages.Title: About Author Page
Pages.Description: This page highlights an author or can be used for a person's biography.

Pages.Title: Contact Us Page
Pages.Description: This is an example contact us form. A developer would need to connect it to a service such as SendGrid, Mailchimp or Constant Contact.

Pages.Title: Sign-in Page
Pages.Description: An example sign in page. A developer would need to implement this design with the authentication back-end that is based on ASP.NET Core Razor pages.

Pages.Title: Single Column Page w/TOC
Pages.Description: Single column page with table of contents (TOC) in left side column.

Pages.Title: Single Column Page w/TOC and Jumbotron
Pages.Description: Single column page with table of contents (TOC) in left side column and a Jumbotron.

Pages.Title: Two Column Page
Pages.Description: Two column page with title block at top.

Pages.Title: Two Column Page w/Jumbotron
Pages.Description: Two column page with title block at top and a Jumbotron.
